example.parse: (S (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC بعد) (NP (NOUN_NUM+CASE_DEF_GEN اربع) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN سنين)))) (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I نعود) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP-PRP (PREP ل) (SBAR (-NONE- 0) (S (VP (IV1P+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:S نسترد) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR-NOM-OBJ (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:1P حققنا) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NP (PVSUFF_DO:3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-1)))))) (CONJ و) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يجب) (SBAR-SBJ (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV_PASS+IVSUFF_MOOD:S ينفذ) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (NP-OBJ (-NONE- *-2)) (PP-TMP (PREP منذ) (NP (NOUN_NUM+CASE_DEF_GEN اربع) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN سنوات))))))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: what we have done and what has to be done since 4 years

example.arg: ما حققناه و ما كان يجب ان ينفذ منذ اربع سنوات .
